text: neohuiga geudeul-ege dol-agass-eul ttae geudeul-eun neohuiege byeonmyeonghani il leogalodoe byeonmyeongchi malla ulineun neo huileul midji anh-eul geos-ila hananim-eun imi uliege neohuiui sosig-eul al lyeojusyeoss-eumyeo hananimgwa seonjijaneun neo huiui il-eul jikyeobosinila geuleonhu neohuineun boiji anihan segyewa bo ineun segyeleul algo gyesin geubun-ege lo dol-agal geos-ini geubun-eun neohuiga haenghago issneun geos-eul boyeo julila
